name: Push-ups
description: Classic push-ups targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps
instructions: Start in plank position, lower chest to ground, push back up

name: Squats
description: Basic squats for leg and glute strength
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower into sitting position, return to standing

name: Plank
description: Hold plank position for core stability
instructions: Hold body straight in plank position, engage core

name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Jump while spreading legs and raising arms overhead

name: Lunges
instructions: Step forward into lunge position, alternate legs

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: In plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest rapidly

name: Tricep Dips
description: Tricep dips using chair or elevated surface
instructions: Sit on edge of chair, lower body using arms, push back up

name: Burpees
instructions: Squat, jump back to plank, do push-up, jump forward, jump up

name: Wall Sit
instructions: Lean back against wall in sitting position, hold

name: High Knees
description: Cardio exercise bringing knees to chest
instructions: Run in place bringing knees up to chest level

name: Bicep Curls
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, curl up to shoulders, lower slowly

name: Dumbbell Squats
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulders or sides, perform squats

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder level, press overhead, lower slowly

name: Dumbbell Deadlifts
instructions: Hold dumbbells, hinge at hips, lower weights, return to standing

name: Chest Fly
instructions: Lie on back, extend arms out, bring dumbbells together over chest

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit with knees bent, hold weight, twist side to side

name: Resistance Band Pulls
instructions: Hold band, pull apart stretching the band

name: Band Squats
instructions: Place band around legs or under feet, perform squats

name: Crunches
instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, lift shoulders off ground

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on side, prop up on elbow, lift body straight

name: Kettlebell Swings
instructions: Hold kettlebell, swing between legs and up to chest level

name: Goblet Squats
instructions: Hold kettlebell at chest, perform deep squats

name: Diamond Push-ups
description: Push-ups with hands in diamond shape
instructions: Form diamond with hands, perform push-ups

name: Pistol Squats
instructions: Balance on one leg, squat down, return to standing

name: Bear Crawl
instructions: Crawl forward on hands and feet, keep knees off ground
